nodes.text: Devsh was a Human male captain of the Galactic Republic stationed on Balmorra with his squad around 3643 BBY, when they were killed.

Devsh appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Balmorra. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
